0.1.name: wordpress/post-metaboxes-tabs
0.1.description:
When you have a lot of metaboxes in the post/page edit screen, you end up scrolling which is confusing. Metaboxes represent a group of fields like Address, or Ingredients, etc. Imagine you are creating a deep CV for a person. Suddently you have Addresses, Contacts, Profile, Education, Skills, Languages, etc. But as you can see

Addresses

, Contacts, Profile can be categorized as `Personal Data.

This plugin lets you group metaboxes by anything, just name each metabox as Tab / Box name. So the

Addresses

metabox should be named as Personal Data / Addresses and it will be grouped with Personal Data / Contact under Personal Data tab.

Notes:

  • Both Tab / Box name and Tab/Box name or Tab/ Box name work
